entry.title: $1900 // 1 Room Studio with separate EIK in Prime Park Slope
entry.content:
Central Park Slope. Stunning 1 room Studio and separate EIK. All in excellent condition, Storm Windows with lots of sunlight, Parquet Floors. $1900.00. Declawed cats are OK. Dogs upto 30 Lbs

Available February show contact info. Ext. 2A

If you like the apartment and wish to apply for the apartment you will need the following:
1. Fill out a credit check application.
2. $100.00 fee IN CASH ONLY (for each applicant on lease or who will reside in unit) to cover the cost of the credit check.
3. Copy of your valid I.D. such as Drivers License, Passport, etc.
4. Copy of S. S. Card.
5. Leave a check of 1 month's rent as a deposit whereupon the apartment will be taken off the market.
